long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A digital Pomodoro Timer to help with maximize workflow and improve productivity. It allows you to set a period of time for to work and keeps a todo list for that session. Once your time is up it will notify you through a Chrome notification.

*NOTE*
This is the code that was developed after following "React & TypeScript Chrome Extension Development [2023]" by Jason Xian from Udemy. This is the result of my experience following the course section.
